org.chronos.chronodb.internal.impl.index.querycache

Class NoIndexQueryCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chronos.chronodb.internal.impl.index.querycache.NoIndexQueryCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ChronoIndexQueryCache

    public class NoIndexQueryCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChronoIndexQueryCache
    This implementation of ChronoIndexQueryCache "fakes" a cache.

    The only purpose of this class is to act as a placeholder for the cache object when caching is disabled. It does nothing else than passing the given search specification to the loading function.

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCalculate

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getOrCalculate(long timestamp,
                                                      Branch branch,
                                                      java.lang.String keyspace,
                                                      SearchSpecification<?> searchSpec,
                                                      java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.util.Set<java.lang.String>> loadingFunction)
        Description copied from interface: ChronoIndexQueryCache
        Runs the given search through the cache.

        If the result for the requested search is already cached, the cached result will be returned. Otherwise, the result will be calculated via the given loadingFunction, and automatically be cached before returning it.

        Specified by:
        getOrCalculate in interface ChronoIndexQueryCache
        Parameters:
        timestamp - The timestamp at which to execute the query. Must not be negative.
        branch - The branch to run the index query on. Must not be null.
        keyspace - The keyspace to search in. Must not be null.
        searchSpec - The search specification to fulfill. Must not be null.
        loadingFunction - The function to use in case that the cache doesn't contain the result of the given query.
        Returns:
        The keys resulting from the given search request. May be empty, but never null.

      • getStats

        public com.google.common.cache.CacheStats getStats()
        Description copied from interface: ChronoIndexQueryCache
        Returns the statistics of this cache.

        The statistics object is only available when the recordStatistics parameter of the constructor was set to true.

        Specified by:
        getStats in interface ChronoIndexQueryCache
        Returns:
        The statistics, or null if recording is turned off.

        Description copied from interface: ChronoIndexQueryCache
        Clears this query cache.
        Specified by:
